verses.verse: וַתָּ֣שַׁר <WH7891> Then sang דְּבוֹרָ֔ה <WH1683> Deborah וּבָרָ֖ק <WH1301> and Barak בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲבִינֹ֑עַם <WH42> of Abinoam בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> on that day הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

בִּפְרֹ֤עַ <WH6544> led פְּרָעוֹת֙ <WH6546> the leaders בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּהִתְנַדֵּ֖ב <WH5068> willingly offered עָ֑ם <WH5971> when the people בָּרֲכ֖וּ <WH1288> Praise יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> ye the LORD

שִׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> Hear מְלָכִ֔ים <WH4428> O ye kings הַאֲזִ֖ינוּ <WH238> give ear רֹֽזְנִ֑ים <WH7336> O ye princes אָֽנֹכִ֗י <WH595> I לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> unto the LORD אָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> I אָשִׁ֔ירָה <WH7891> I [even] I will sing אֲזַמֵּ֕ר <WH2167> I will sing לַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> [praise] to the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> LORD בְּצֵאתְךָ֤ <WH3318> when thou wentest out מִשֵּׂעִיר֙ <WH8165> of Seir בְּצַעְדְּךָ֙ <WH6805> when thou marchedst out מִשְּׂדֵ֣ה <WH7704> of the field אֱד֔וֹם <WH123> of Edom אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> the earth רָעָ֔שָׁה <WH7493> trembled גַּם־ <WH1571> also שָׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> and the heavens נָטָ֑פוּ <WH5197> dropped גַּם־ <WH1571> Even עָבִ֖ים <WH5645> the clouds נָ֥טְפוּ <WH5197> also dropped מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> water

הָרִ֥ים <WH2022> The mountains נָזְל֖וּ <WH5140> melted מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> from before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD זֶ֣ה <WH2088> This סִינַ֔י <WH5514> [even] that Sinai מִפְּנֵ֕י <WH6440> from before יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

בִּימֵ֞י <WH3117> In the days שַׁמְגַּ֤ר <WH8044> of Shamgar בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עֲנָת֙ <WH6067> of Anath בִּימֵ֣י <WH3117> in the days יָעֵ֔ל <WH3278> of Jael חָדְל֖וּ <WH2308> were unoccupied אֳרָח֑וֹת <WH734> the highways וְהֹלְכֵ֣י <WH1980> and the travellers נְתִיב֔וֹת <WH5410> path יֵלְכ֕וּ <WH1980> went אֳרָח֖וֹת <WH734> ways עֲקַלְקַלּֽוֹת׃ <WH6128> roundabout

חָדְל֧וּ <WH2308> ceased פְרָז֛וֹן <WH6520> [The inhabitants of] the villages בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> in Israel חָדֵ֑לּוּ <WH2308> they ceased עַ֤ד <WH5704> Until שַׁקַּ֙מְתִּי֙ <WH6965> arose דְּבוֹרָ֔ה <WH1683> until that I Deborah שַׁקַּ֥מְתִּי <WH6965> that I arose אֵ֖ם <WH517> a mother בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> in Israel

יִבְחַר֙ <WH977> They chose אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> gods חֲדָשִׁ֔ים <WH2319> new אָ֖ז <WH227> Then לָחֶ֣ם <WH3901> then [was] war שְׁעָרִ֑ים <WH8179> in the gates מָגֵ֤ן <WH4043> was there a shield אִם־ <WH518> lo יֵֽרָאֶה֙ <WH7200> seen וָרֹ֔מַח <WH7420> or spear בְּאַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> among forty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel

לִבִּי֙ <WH3820> My heart לְחוֹקְקֵ֣י <WH2710> [is] toward the governors יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel הַמִּֽתְנַדְּבִ֖ים <WH5068> that offered themselves willingly בָּעָ֑ם <WH5971> among the people בָּרֲכ֖וּ <WH1288> Bless יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> ye the LORD

רֹכְבֵי֩ <WH7392> ye that ride אֲתֹנ֨וֹת <WH860> asses צְחֹר֜וֹת <WH6715> on white יֹשְׁבֵ֧י <WH3427> ye that sit עַל־ <WH5921> on מִדִּ֛ין <WH4055> in judgment וְהֹלְכֵ֥י <WH1980> and walk עַל־ <WH5921> on דֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way שִֽׂיחוּ׃ <WH7878> Speak

מִקּ֣וֹל <WH6963> [They that are delivered] from the noise מְחַֽצְצִ֗ים <WH2686> of archers בֵּ֚ין <WH996> among מַשְׁאַבִּ֔ים <WH4857> in the places of drawing water שָׁ֤ם <WH8033> There יְתַנּוּ֙ <WH8567> there shall they rehearse צִדְק֣וֹת <WH6666> the righteous acts יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD צִדְקֹ֥ת <WH6666> [even] the righteous acts פִּרְזֹנ֖וֹ <WH6520> [toward the inhabitants] of his villages בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> in Israel אָ֛ז <WH227> Then יָרְד֥וּ <WH3381> go down לַשְּׁעָרִ֖ים <WH8179> to the gates עַם־ <WH5971> then shall the people יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

עוּרִ֤י <WH5782> Awake עוּרִי֙ <WH5782> awake דְּבוֹרָ֔ה <WH1683> Deborah ע֥וּרִי <WH5782> awake ע֖וּרִי <WH5782> awake דַּבְּרִי־ <WH1696> utter שִׁ֑יר <WH7892> a song ק֥וּם <WH6965> arise בָּרָ֛ק <WH1301> Barak וּֽשֲׁבֵ֥ה <WH7628> and lead thy captivity שֶׁבְיְךָ֖ <WH7617> captive בֶּן־ <WH1121> thou son אֲבִינֹֽעַם׃ <WH42> of Abinoam

אָ֚ז <WH227> Then יְרַ֣ד <WH7287> have dominion שָׂרִ֔יד <WH8300> Then he made him that remaineth לְאַדִּירִ֖ים <WH117> over the nobles עָ֑ם <WH5971> among the people יְהוָ֕ה <WH3068> the LORD יְרַד־ <WH7287> made me have dominion לִ֖י בַּגִּבּוֹרִֽים׃ <WH1368> over the mighty

מִנִּ֣י <WH4480> From אֶפְרַ֗יִם <WH669> Out of Ephraim שָׁרְשָׁם֙ <WH8328> [was there] a root בַּעֲמָלֵ֔ק <WH6002> of them against Amalek אַחֲרֶ֥יךָ <WH310> after בִנְיָמִ֖ין <WH1144> thee Benjamin בַּֽעֲמָמֶ֑יךָ <WH5971> among thy people מִנִּ֣י <WH4480> From מָכִ֗יר <WH4353> out of Machir יָֽרְדוּ֙ <WH3381> came down מְחֹ֣קְקִ֔ים <WH2710> governors וּמִ֨זְּבוּלֻ֔ן <WH2074> and out of Zebulun מֹשְׁכִ֖ים <WH4900> they that handle בְּשֵׁ֥בֶט <WH7626> the pen סֹפֵֽר׃ <WH5608> of the writer

וְשָׂרַ֤י <WH8269> And the princes בְּיִשָּׂשכָר֙ <WH3485> of Issachar עִם־ <WH5973> with דְּבֹרָ֔ה <WH1683> [were] with Deborah וְיִשָּׂשכָר֙ <WH3485> even Issachar כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> so בָּרָ֔ק <WH1301> and also Barak בָּעֵ֖מֶק <WH6010> into the valley שֻׁלַּ֣ח <WH7971> he was sent בְּרַגְלָ֑יו <WH7272> on foot בִּפְלַגּ֣וֹת <WH6391> division רְאוּבֵ֔ן <WH7205> of Reuben גְּדֹלִ֖ים <WH1419> [there were] great חִקְקֵי־ <WH2711> thoughts לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> of heart

לָ֣מָּה <WH4100> Why יָשַׁ֗בְתָּ <WH3427> Why abodest בֵּ֚ין <WH996> thou among הַֽמִּשְׁפְּתַ֔יִם <WH4942> the sheepfolds לִשְׁמֹ֖עַ <WH8085> to hear שְׁרִק֣וֹת <WH8292> the bleatings עֲדָרִ֑ים <WH5739> drove לִפְלַגּ֣וֹת <WH6391> division רְאוּבֵ֔ן <WH7205> of Reuben גְּדוֹלִ֖ים <WH1419> [there were] great חִקְרֵי־ <WH2714> searchings לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> of heart

גִּלְעָ֗ד <WH1568> Gilead בְּעֵ֤בֶר <WH5676> beyond הַיַּרְדֵּן֙ <WH3383> Jordan שָׁכֵ֔ן <WH7931> abode וְדָ֕ן <WH1835> and why did Dan לָ֥מָּה <WH4100> and why יָג֖וּר <WH1481> remain אֳנִיּ֑וֹת <WH591> ship אָשֵׁ֗ר <WH836> Asher יָשַׁב֙ <WH3427> continued לְח֣וֹף <WH2348> shore יַמִּ֔ים <WH3220> on the sea וְעַ֥ל <WH5921> and מִפְרָצָ֖יו <WH4664> in his breaches יִשְׁכּֽוֹן׃ <WH7931> and abode

זְבֻל֗וּן <WH2074> Zebulun עַ֣ם <WH5971> [were] a people חֵרֵ֥ף <WH2778> [that] jeoparded נַפְשׁ֛וֹ <WH5315> their lives לָמ֖וּת <WH4191> unto the death וְנַפְתָּלִ֑י <WH5321> and Naphtali עַ֖ל <WH5921> on מְרוֹמֵ֥י <WH4791> in the high places שָׂדֶֽה׃ <WH7704> of the field

בָּ֤אוּ <WH935> came מְלָכִים֙ <WH4428> The kings נִלְחָ֔מוּ <WH3898> [and] fought אָ֤ז <WH227> Then נִלְחֲמוּ֙ <WH3898> then fought מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> the kings כְנַ֔עַן <WH3667> of Canaan בְּתַעְנַ֖ךְ <WH8590> in Taanach עַל־ <WH5921> near מֵ֣י <WH4325> by the waters מְגִדּ֑וֹ <WH4023> of Megiddo בֶּ֥צַע <WH1215> no gain כֶּ֖סֶף <WH3701> of money לֹ֥א <WH3808> no לָקָֽחוּ׃ <WH3947> they took

מִן־ <WH4480> from שָׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> from heaven נִלְחָ֑מוּ <WH3898> They fought הַכּֽוֹכָבִים֙ <WH3556> the stars מִמְּסִלּוֹתָ֔ם <WH4546> in their courses נִלְחֲמ֖וּ <WH3898> fought עִם־ <WH5973> against סִיסְרָֽא׃ <WH5516> against Sisera

נַ֤חַל <WH5158> The river קִישׁוֹן֙ <WH7028> of Kishon גְּרָפָ֔ם <WH1640> swept them away נַ֥חַל <WH5158> river קְדוּמִ֖ים <WH6917> that ancient נַ֣חַל <WH5158> the river קִישׁ֑וֹן <WH7028> Kishon תִּדְרְכִ֥י <WH1869> thou hast trodden down נַפְשִׁ֖י <WH5315> O my soul עֹֽז׃ <WH5797> strength

אָ֥ז <WH227> Then הָלְמ֖וּ <WH1986> broken עִקְּבֵי־ <WH6119> hoofs ס֑וּס <WH5483> the horses' מִֽדַּהֲר֖וֹת <WH1726> by the means of the pransings דַּהֲר֥וֹת <WH1726> the pransings אַבִּירָֽיו׃ <WH47> of their mighty ones

א֣וֹרוּ <WH779> Curse מֵר֗וֹז <WH4789> ye Meroz אָמַר֙ <WH559> said מַלְאַ֣ךְ <WH4397> the angel יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֹ֥רוּ <WH779> curse אָר֖וֹר <WH779> ye bitterly יֹשְׁבֶ֑יהָ <WH3427> the inhabitants כִּ֤י <WH3588> Because לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not בָ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> thereof because they came לְעֶזְרַ֣ת <WH5833> not to the help יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD לְעֶזְרַ֥ת <WH5833> to the help יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD בַּגִּבּוֹרִֽים׃ <WH1368> against the mighty

תְּבֹרַךְ֙ <WH1288> Blessed מִנָּשִׁ֔ים <WH802> above women יָעֵ֕ל <WH3278> shall Jael אֵ֖שֶׁת <WH802> the wife חֶ֣בֶר <WH2268> of Heber הַקֵּינִ֑י <WH7017> the Kenite מִנָּשִׁ֥ים <WH802> shall she be above women בָּאֹ֖הֶל <WH168> in the tent תְּבֹרָֽךְ׃ <WH1288> be blessed

מַ֥יִם <WH4325> water שָׁאַ֖ל <WH7592> He asked חָלָ֣ב <WH2461> [him] milk נָתָ֑נָה <WH5414> [and] she gave בְּסֵ֥פֶל <WH5602> dish אַדִּירִ֖ים <WH117> in a lordly הִקְרִ֥יבָה <WH7126> she brought forth חֶמְאָֽה׃ <WH2529> butter

יָדָהּ֙ <WH3027> her hand לַיָּתֵ֣ד <WH3489> to the nail תִּשְׁלַ֔חְנָה <WH7971> She put וִֽימִינָ֖הּ <WH3225> and her right hand לְהַלְמ֣וּת <WH1989> hammer עֲמֵלִ֑ים <WH6001> to the workmen's וְהָלְמָ֤ה <WH1986> and with the hammer she smote סִֽיסְרָא֙ <WH5516> Sisera מָחֲקָ֣ה <WH4277> she smote off רֹאשׁ֔וֹ <WH7218> his head וּמָחֲצָ֥ה <WH4272> when she had pierced וְחָלְפָ֖ה <WH2498> and stricken through רַקָּתֽוֹ׃ <WH7541> his temples

בֵּ֣ין <WH996> Between רַגְלֶ֔יהָ <WH7272> At her feet כָּרַ֥ע <WH3766> he bowed נָפַ֖ל <WH5307> he fell שָׁכָ֑ב <WH7901> he lay down בֵּ֤ין <WH996> Between רַגְלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH7272> at her feet כָּרַ֣ע <WH3766> he bowed נָפָ֔ל <WH5307> he fell בַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> where כָּרַ֔ע <WH3766> he bowed שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there נָפַ֥ל <WH5307> there he fell down שָׁדֽוּד׃ <WH7703> dead

בְּעַד֩ <WH1157> through הַחַלּ֨וֹן <WH2474> out at a window נִשְׁקְפָ֧ה <WH8259> looked וַתְּיַבֵּ֛ב <WH2980> and cried אֵ֥ם <WH517> The mother סִֽיסְרָ֖א <WH5516> of Sisera בְּעַ֣ד <WH1157> through הָֽאֶשְׁנָ֑ב <WH822> through the lattice מַדּ֗וּעַ <WH4069> Why בֹּשֵׁ֤שׁ <WH954> [so] long רִכְבּוֹ֙ <WH7393> Why is his chariot לָב֔וֹא <WH935> in coming מַדּ֣וּעַ <WH4069> Why אֶֽחֱר֔וּ <WH309> ? why tarry פַּעֲמֵ֖י <WH6471> the wheels מַרְכְּבוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH4818> of his chariots

חַכְמ֥וֹת <WH2450> Her wise שָׂרוֹתֶ֖יהָ <WH8282> ladies תַּעֲנֶ֑ינָּה <WH6030> answered אַף־ <WH637> her Indeed הִ֕יא <WH1931> she תָּשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> her yea she returned אֲמָרֶ֖יהָ <WH559> answer לָֽהּ׃

הֲלֹ֨א <WH3808> not יִמְצְא֜וּ <WH4672> Have they not sped יְחַלְּק֣וּ <WH2505> ? have they [not] divided שָׁלָ֗ל <WH7998> the prey רַ֤חַם <WH7356> a damsel רַחֲמָתַ֙יִם֙ <WH7361> [or] two לְרֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> to every גֶּ֔בֶר <WH1397> man שְׁלַ֤ל <WH7998> a prey צְבָעִים֙ <WH6648> of divers colours לְסִ֣יסְרָ֔א <WH5516> to Sisera שְׁלַ֥ל <WH7998> a prey צְבָעִ֖ים <WH6648> of divers colours רִקְמָ֑ה <WH7553> of needlework צֶ֥בַע <WH6648> of divers colours רִקְמָתַ֖יִם <WH7553> of needlework on both sides לְצַוְּארֵ֥י <WH6677> [meet] for the necks שָׁלָֽל׃ <WH7998> A spoil

כֵּ֠ן <WH3651> Thus יֹאבְד֤וּ <WH6> perish כָל־ <WH3605> all אוֹיְבֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH341> So let all thine enemies יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> O LORD וְאֹ֣הֲבָ֔יו <WH157> but [let] them that love כְּצֵ֥את <WH3318> when he goeth forth הַשֶּׁ֖מֶשׁ <WH8121> him [be] as the sun בִּגְבֻרָת֑וֹ <WH1369> in his might וַתִּשְׁקֹ֥ט <WH8252> had rest הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> And the land אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> forty שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> years פ
